alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.4.1
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.4.1 to testers in the beta update channel. This update introduces some improvements and bug fixes for the previous release (beta 1.4).

Here's what's new and improvements:

  • More improvements for Light Theme
  • Added light theme support to Retweet Dialog
  • Added light theme support for Like Dialog
  • Fixed an issue where the TweetDeck shortcuts won't work when quickly switching between windows
  • Fixed an issue where the TweetDeck shortcuts won't work on app launch
  • Fixed an issue where the TweetDeck shortcuts won't work when the user focuses on the window by clicking on the titlebar
  • Fixed navigation with arrow keys for light theme
  • Fixed broken support and feedback links
